EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to Salesforce.com!
Keep this message in a place where you can quickly retrieve it for future reference. You may want to print a hard copy. Please note that “Salesforce.com” and “SFDC” are used synonymously.
SFDC Login Information
User Name: Your Univar email address (firstname.lastname@univarusa.com)
Password: Your network password (case-sensitive)
URL: http://webapps.univarusa.com/
Important Information To Help You Start Using Salesforce.com
How will I be trained?
Your first task in the training process is to complete the Salesforce.com online courses listed below:
A. Getting Started: Navigating Salesforce
1. Log in to Salesforce.com (www.salesforce.com).
2. Click the Help & Training link near the top of the screen.
3. Scroll down to the Training panel in the lower left.
4. Under Take an Online Course, click Getting Started: Navigating Salesforce.
NOTE: not all of the features shown in the training are turned on in this instance.
B. Salesforce.com Basic Training: Managing Accounts, CPPs, and Opportunities
1. Log in to The U Online using Identity Access Management (IAM)* and your Global User ID.
2. In the Featured panel, click Managing Accounts, CPPs, and Opportunities.
3. Click Enroll.
4. Click the My Learning tab.
5. Click a class listed under My Elective Learning.
6. Begin a course by clicking the link beneath Activity Name.
*More information on IAM
How can I get my Outlook Contacts and Events into SFDC?
Click here: Working with Connect for Outlook
What if I need additional help?
If you need additional help or support, look for answers on the following topics in the following locations.
General help in using SFDC to do your job
Consult the SFDC page in the reSOURCE Library, the SFDC online Help & Training section, or your direct supervisor or manager.
Technical support (when things just don’t seem to be working right)
Call the Univar USA Service Desk at 1-800-289-8892, or e-mail service.desk@univarusa.com
Thank You!
Univar Global Salesforce.com Support Team
